alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:46AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brazoria and north central Matagorda Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 546 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sweeny, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Lake Jackson, West Columbia, Sweeny, Brazoria, Holiday Lakes, Bailey`s Prairie and Wild Peach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda
